ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Goddess Inc.
ComicInfo.Summary:
Writer LaToya Morgan (AMC's TURN) joins the Zenescope team with a brand new, modern re-imagining of Greek mythology like you have never seen before. Zeus heads to Vegas in order to recruit his powerful but estranged sister. Meanwhile, Venus continues making her chess moves and finds herself in Artemis's crosshairs.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Mike Krome & Wes Hartman | 1 | B | Cover B | Giuseppe Cafaro, Simone Di Meo & Vinicius Andrade | 2 | C | Cover C | Vincenzo Cucca & Ylenia Di Napoli | 3 | RE | Hot Flips New York Comic Con Exclusive Cover, Limited to 100 | Nei Ruffino | Missing |
